meanings.definition: A small French coin worth five centimes.
meanings.sent1: I found a doucet on the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The doucet was used in France long ago.
meanings.sent3: The doucet rolled under the couch and hid.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a shiny doucet in a sea of pennies.
meanings.sent5: The doucet gleamed in the sunlight, catching my eye.

meanings.sent1: Mr. Doucet is our new neighbor.
meanings.sent2: The Doucet family has a long history in this town.
meanings.sent3: Doucet sounds like a fancy name for a cat.
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was as noticeable as the Doucet sign on the building.
meanings.sent5: The Doucet surname echoed through the halls of the old mansion.
